ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [eqbards] Need assistance please  ]
ygData.msgSnippet: I had an absolutely wonderful time! It ended up that the king never moved me therefore I didn t have to duel. But it was a blast! All of the data has been put
ygData.messageBody:
I had an absolutely wonderful time! It ended up that the king never moved me
therefore I didn't have to duel. But it was a blast! All of the data has been
put up on a website if you are interested in checking it out. I'm going to
copy and paste the link into here, but I don't know if it will show up as a
link. I hope so :-)

http://www3.sympatico.ca/seyil/villa/chess.htm

Thanks for all the wonderful suggestions. I have so much to learn and who
better to learn it from than fellow bards!

Melodii (Bard of 11 seasons)
Karana Server

blzkrg@... wrote:

> How'd this go?
>
>
> > Hi fellow bards!
> >
> > I need some information assistance. We are having an event on my server,
> > Karana, on Saturday. We are having a chessmatch at the chessboard with
> duels.
> > Different level players have been chosen for the role's of King, Queen,
> > Bishop, Rooks and Pawns. I volunteered to be there because my guild has a
> > major role in the event. I am a Level 11 bard. I figured I would be asked
> to
> > assist in the organization of the event. However, I have been chosen as a
> > PAWN! Could anyone advise me on the best strategy to employ to possibly
> come
> > out of this alive? I know I am probably being vague as to some of the
> rules of
> > the game but that is because they are still being determined. I do know
> that
> > charming will not be allowed. Only self-buffs will be allowed. DOT's are
> > allowed.
> >
> > I am still in the process of figuring out how to be the best bard that I
> can
> > be and I have a lot to learn. So I look to each of you......the experts!
> >
> > Thanks in advance for any assistance you could give me!
> >
> > Melodii (Bard of 11 seasons)
> >
> >
> >
